caption block

block_caption.Rd

Create a representation of a caption that can be used for cross reference. The caption can also be an auto numbered paragraph.

block_caption(label, style, id, autonum = NULL)

Arguments

label

a scalar character representing label to display
style

paragraph style name
id

cross reference identifier
autonum

an object generated with function run_autonum

See also

Other block functions for reporting: block_section(), block_table(), block_toc()

Examples

block_caption("a caption", style = "Normal", id = "caption_id")
#> caption [anto-num on]: a caption
block_caption("a caption",
  style = "Normal", id = "caption_id",
  autonum = run_autonum()
)
#> caption [antonum off]: a caption

Contents

  • Arguments
  • See also
